title: Bug 39689Tomcat Server Side Includes (SSI) do not work with single quotes
description: Bug 39689Tomcat Server Side Includes (SSI) do not work with single quotes "Tomcat SSI support is suposed to implement the same SSI directives as Apache.Unfortunately, it is not possible to enclose attribute values in single quotes.Thank you very much for reading this bug report.
OB: In http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/en/mod/modinclude.html (apache 2.0 SSIdocumentation) you can read:"The value [of an attribute value] will often be enclosed in double quotes, butsingle quotes (') and backticks (`) are also possible.
